mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDERLIST ( ORDER_NO, ORDER_DATE, MEMBER_ID, ORDER_ADDR, ORDER_PHONE, ORDER_NAME, ORDER_STATE, ORDER_PAYMENT, ORDER_EMAIL, ORDER_TOTALPAYMENT ) VALUES ( ORDERLIST_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, SYSDATE, #{MEMBER_ID}, #{ORDER_ADDR}, #{ORDER_PHONE}, #{ORDER_NAME}, #{ORDER_STATE}, 1, #{ORDER_EMAIL}, #{ORDER_TOTALPAYMENT} )
mapper.select: SELECT ORDERLIST_NO_SEQ.CURRVAL AS ORDER_NO FROM DUAL

select COU_NO, COU_CONTENT, COU_SDATE, COU_EDATE, MEMBER_ID, COU_USEDATE, COU_STATE, COU_DISCOUNT, COU_ORIGIN_NO
FROM COUPON_MEMLIST
WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{MEMBER_ID} AND COU_STATE = 2
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDERDETAIL ( ORDER_NO, ORDERITEM_NAME, ORDERITEM_COUNT, ORDERITEM_SIZE, ORDERITEM_COLOR, ORDERITEM_PRICE, ORDERITEM_STATE, ORDERITEM_DATE, ORDERITEM_OPTION, ITEM_NO ) VALUES ( #{ORDER_NO}, #{ORDERITEM_NAME}, #{ORDERITEM_COUNT}, #{ORDERITEM_SIZE}, #{ORDERITEM_COLOR}, #{ORDERITEM_PRICE}, #{ORDERITEM_STATE}, sysdate, #{ORDERITEM_OPTION}, #{ITEM_NO} )
mapper.select: SELECT ORDER_NO, ORDER_ADDR, MEMBER_ID, ORDER_PHONE, ORDER_NAME, TO_CHAR(ORDER_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS ORDER_DATE, ORDER_STATE, ORDER_PAYMENT, ORDER_EXCHANGE, ORDER_TOTALPAYMENT FROM ORDERLIST WHERE ORDER_NO = #{ORDER_NO}
SELECT ORDER_NO, ORDERITEM_NAME, ORDERITEM_COUNT, ORDERITEM_SIZE, ORDERITEM_COLOR, ORDERITEM_PRICE, ORDERITEM_STATE, ORDERITEM_OPTION, ITEM_NO FROM ORDERDETAIL WHERE ORDER_NO = #{ORDER_NO}
mapper.update: UPDATE ORDERLIST SET ORDER_STATE = #{ORDER_STATE}, ORDER_EXCHANGE = #{ORDER_EXCHANGE} WHERE ORDER_NO = #{ORDER_NO}
